meanings.definition: relating to the science or technology of metals
meanings.sent1: The metallurgical research team conducted experiments on different metals.
meanings.sent2: The company hired a metallurgical engineer to improve metal production.
meanings.sent3: The robot made a metallurgical blunder by mixing the wrong metals together.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a metallurgical puzzle, trying to understand the properties of each metal.
meanings.sent5: The metallurgical workshop buzzed with the sound of machines shaping metal.

meanings.definition: the process of extracting metals from their ores
meanings.sent1: Metallurgical involves extracting metals from rocks deep underground.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization mastered the art of metallurgical to create tools.
meanings.sent3: During the treasure hunt, they stumbled upon a hidden metallurgical site.
meanings.sent4: The metallurgical of gold from the earth symbolized wealth and power.
meanings.sent5: The metallurgical of iron from ore required great skill and patience.

meanings.definition: a person who specializes in metallurgy
meanings.sent1: The metallurgical was renowned for discovering new metal alloys.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to become a metallurgical and study the properties of metals.
meanings.sent3: The eccentric metallurgical always wore a hat made of metal scraps.
meanings.sent4: The metallurgical was like a wizard, transforming metals into valuable creations.
meanings.sent5: The young metallurgical apprentice eagerly absorbed knowledge from the master.
